article.name: KnowBe4 Privacy Policy and Terms of Service
article.title: KnowBe4 Privacy Policy and Terms of Service
article.body:
We periodically update our policies and require that all customers review and acknowledge these revisions. When prompted, you will be asked to review and acknowledge our policies before you can log in to your KnowBe4 account. You can expect to see this prompt the first time you log in to your account as well as when your account's subscription has been renewed.

See our official policies linked below:

Privacy Policy: https://www.KnowBe4.com/Product-Privacy-Notice

Terms of Service: https://www.KnowBe4.com/Legal

If you have any questions, you can submit a support ticket here.
